attributes.description:
The perfect mid size performance SUV get this beautiful 2020 BMW X3 M40i and be part of the 50 years of M. It has only 32 000km and is packed with extras such as: 


-M Sport brakes
-Sport automatic transmission
-BMW Individual roof rails high-gloss Shadow Line
-Sport seats for driver and front passenger
-Interior trim finishers Aluminium Rhombicle with highlight trim fin.Pearl Chrome
-Double-spoke style 718 M, 21" with mixed tyres
-Tyre Pressure Monitoring
-Comfort Access
-Trailer tow hitch, fully electrically operated
-Panorama glass sliding/tilting sun roof, electrically operated
-Roller Sun Blind For Rear Side Windows(mechanical)
-Ambient interior lighting
-Adaptive LED headlights
-High Beam Assist
-Parking Assist Plus
-Head-up display 
-Harman/kardon Surround Sound System
-Comfort telephony with wireless charging
-BMW Live Cockpit Professional
-BMW Gesture Control
